title: In ‘Dangerous Liaisons,’ Alice Englert and Nicholas Denton Play the Game
description: In a decadent new Starz drama, the two actors play young versions of literature’s most poisoned and poisonous power couple.
dc:creator: Alexis Soloski
media:credit: Sabrina Santiago for The New York Times
media:description: Nicholas Denton and Alice Englert play Pascal, a young mapmaker, and Camille, a sex worker, before they become the Vicomte de Valmont and Marquise de Merteuil.
